properties.NAME: Phillip and Patricia Frost Museum of Science
properties.DESCRIPTIO: Hands-on facility offers weather & technology exhibits, planetarium & wildlife centers.

properties.NAME: Pérez Art Museum Miami
properties.DESCRIPTIO: Pérez Art Museum Miami (PAMM) is a modern and contemporary art museum dedicated to collecting and exhibiting international art of the 20th and 21st centuries.

properties.NAME: Miami History Museum
properties.DESCRIPTIO: History Miami Museum, formerly known as the Historical Museum of Southern Florida, is a museum located in Downtown Miami, Florida, United States. History Miami Museum is the largest history museum in the State of Florida.

properties.NAME: Vizcaya Museum & Gardens
properties.DESCRIPTIO: The Vizcaya Museum and Gardens, previously known as Villa Vizcaya, is the former villa and estate of businessman James Deering, of the Deering McCormick-International Harvester fortune.

properties.NAME: De la Cruz Collection
properties.DESCRIPTIO: Owned by the Cuban-born American businessman Carlos de la Cruz and his wife Rosa. It houses their art collection and is open to the public free of charge.

properties.NAME: Gold Coast Railroad Museum
properties.DESCRIPTIO: Is the largest collection of trains in Floirda. Features FDR train Cart. It also have a working locomative.

properties.NAME: Museum of Discovery and Science
properties.DESCRIPTIO: The features mutiple simulaters, wildlife, and inter active exhibits.
